days.text: Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cold and very dry. Fine. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
